channel.title: Is it possible to
channel.description:
I'm adding a lot of npc's to my server now, and i was wondering, is it possible to spawn them so they face a certain direction? All the npc's I spawn face south...and for npc's like a banker etc, I would rather have it so they face the bank window instead of starring at a wall.....
Anyone have any ideas? Or is this even possible? :confused:
erm...hello? Anyone?

Anyone have any ideas? Or is this even possible?
